name: rok-plugin-marketplace
description: ROK Copilot plugins for Claude Code: development workflows, session management, R-P-I methodology, and agency orchestration patterns.

plugins.name: rok-genesis-core
plugins.description: ROK Copilot core conventions: session management, clean compaction, learning capture with diary/reflect, project initialization with Genesis templates (Next.js + Supabase + Tailwind), and development workflow standards.

plugins.name: rok-rpi-workflow
plugins.description: Research-Plan-Implement (R-P-I) development methodology. Three-phase workflow: research gathers information, plan creates blueprints for approval, implement executes with validation. Includes complexity assessment and pre-implementation protocol.

plugins.name: rok-agency-workflows
plugins.description: Agency workflow patterns: multi-agent orchestration with dispatch, task delegation with spawn-agent, cross-session memory management, browser-based UI validation, PRD generation, and feature list tracking.

plugins.name: adjuster-prospecting
plugins.description: Insurance adjuster prospecting for restoration companies. Find carrier adjusters by territory, build profiles, draft outreach, and track relationship pipeline. Built for DMV area restoration businesses.

plugins.name: contractor-prospecting
plugins.description: Contractor referral prospecting for specialty restoration companies. Find GCs and restoration contractors, build profiles, draft partnership outreach, and track referral pipeline. Built for DMV area.

plugins.name: lead-enrichment
plugins.description: Enrich business leads with company intelligence, contact discovery, and validation for the restoration industry. Research companies, validate emails and phone numbers, generate enrichment reports, and export to Excel/PDF.

plugins.name: seo-content-optimizer
plugins.description: Systematic SEO management for large landing page inventories. Batch audit pages, analyze keyword density and cannibalization, generate optimized title tags and meta descriptions, integrate Google Search Console data, and export professional PDF and Excel reports.

plugins.name: youtube-intelligence
plugins.description: YouTube video analysis and knowledge extraction. Analyze transcripts, summarize key insights, validate with external research, manage trusted creator profiles, batch-analyze topics, maintain a knowledge library, and generate implementation briefs for Claude Code planning sessions.

plugins.name: legal-case-builder
plugins.description: Legal case builder with MCP-powered document ingestion, SQLite database, timeline generation, evidence search, and claim construction. Ingest PDFs, categorize with AI, search documents, and build legal arguments with cited evidence chains.

plugins.name: deal-management
plugins.description: Pipeline and deal management with configurable stages, scoring, analytics, and forecasting. Track deals, partnerships, and opportunities through customizable pipelines with stage transitions, weighted forecasting, and professional Excel/PDF exports.

plugins.name: campaign-management
plugins.description: Email and SMS campaign management with contact database, template library, draft-and-track workflow, drip sequences, A/B testing, and full analytics. Track campaigns from draft through conversion with professional Excel/PDF exports.

plugins.name: production-code-review
plugins.description: Comprehensive pre-production code review with 6 specialized subagents analyzing code quality, test coverage, UI/UX, responsive design, security, and performance in parallel. Generates scored reports with production readiness verdict exported to MD, PDF, and HTML.

plugins.name: business-idea-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze business ideas through multi-dimensional research with 5 parallel agents evaluating market demand, competitive landscape, financial viability, execution feasibility, and risk. Produces ranked opportunity reports with composite scores, go/no-go verdicts, and exports to MD, PDF, and HTML.

plugins.name: business-idea-finder
plugins.description: Discover micro-SaaS and AI tool business ideas through pain point mining, gap analysis, and technology arbitrage scanning. Three research modes with scan/explore/deep-scan depth. Profile-filtered for solopreneur builders. Outputs ranked shortlists that feed into business-idea-analyzer.

plugins.name: vehicle-recommender
plugins.description: Interview-driven vehicle recommendation engine. Gathers requirements through structured questions, dispatches 4 parallel research agents to analyze pricing, reliability, cost-of-ownership, and feature matching. Produces ranked recommendations with ready-to-paste finder prompts for future vehicle-finder plugin handoff.

plugins.name: vehicle-finder
plugins.description: Find real vehicle inventory listings from aggregator sites. Takes a finder_prompt from vehicle-recommender output or freeform search, dispatches 2 research agents to search Cars.com, AutoTrader, CarGurus, Edmunds, and TrueCar for actual listings with deal ratings, FMV validation, and dealer intelligence. Exports to HTML, PDF, and Markdown.

plugins.name: camper-recommender
plugins.description: Interview-driven camper and RV recommendation engine. Gathers requirements through structured questions (type, budget, must-haves, priorities, tow vehicle), dispatches 4 parallel research agents to analyze market pricing, build quality, cost-of-ownership, and floorplan/feature matching. Produces ranked recommendations with ready-to-paste finder prompts for camper-finder plugin handoff.

plugins.name: camper-finder
plugins.description: Find real camper and RV inventory listings from aggregator sites. Takes a finder_prompt from camper-recommender output or freeform search, dispatches 2 research agents to search RVTrader, Camping World, General RV, RVUSA, and PPL Motor Homes for actual listings with deal ratings, NADA value validation, and dealer intelligence. Exports to HTML, PDF, and Markdown.

plugins.name: intel-briefing
plugins.description: Intelligence briefing system for continuous document analysis and forecasting. Ingest YouTube videos, URLs, articles, PDFs, and text files. Extract structured claims, validate via external research, generate cumulative master briefings with financial, geopolitical, and labor market sections including AI impact analysis, track prediction accuracy with Brier scores, and export to HTML, PDF, and Markdown.
